column3: September 14 (Fitch) Fitch Ratings has assigned a 'BBB' rating to  Thermo Fisher Scientific Inc.'s (Thermo Fisher) new USD senior notes offering.  Fitch expects that the proceeds of the issue will be used to fund the early call  of the company's $900 million bond due February 2017 and for general corporate  purposes.
